mapper.select:
select
from exam_registration_info where kaoci_id = #{kaociId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and payment_status = 1

select exam_registration_info.* from exam_registration_info,registration_info,district where district.district_id = #{districtId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and district.district_name = registration_info.district and registration_info.id = exam_registration_info.id and exam_registration_info.kaoci_id = #{kaociId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and payment_status = 1
mapper.insert: insert into exam_registration_info (exam_rgstr_id, examinee_id, kaoci_id, rgstr_time, payment_status) values (#{examRgstrId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{examineeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kaociId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rgstrTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{paymentStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into exam_registration_info
exam_rgstr_id,
examinee_id,
kaoci_id,
rgstr_time,
payment_status,

update exam_registration_info
examinee_id = #{examineeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
kaoci_id = #{kaociId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
